com.webs.api
Class WebsApiClient

java.lang.Object
  com.webs.api.WebsApiClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppApi, MemberApi, SiteApi
public class WebsApiClient
extends Object
implements AppApi, MemberApi, SiteApi

Simple API client for use with the Webs.com REST API. Using JSON as the data format, this class is responsible for marshalling domain-specific objects to/from JSON in communication with the API server. Most methods which modify data will need an OAuth access token passed through the constructor.

Author:
Patrick Carroll

getSiteSubscriptions

public List<SiteSubscription> getSiteSubscriptions(WebsIDId websIDId)
Description copied from interface: MemberApi
Get a list of sites the given WebsID is subscribed to

Specified by:
getSiteSubscriptions in interface MemberApi
Parameters:
websIDId - The ID of the member
Returns:
A list of all of the sites where the given WebsID is a member. If a valid OAuth token is passed with the appropriate permissions, private subscriptions will also be returned.

getSiteSubscriptions

public List<SiteSubscription> getSiteSubscriptions(WebsIDId websIDId,
                                                   String permission)
Description copied from interface: MemberApi
Get a list of sites the given WebsID is subscribed to and filter by permission

Specified by:
getSiteSubscriptions in interface MemberApi
Parameters:
websIDId - The ID of the member
permission - Only subscriptions with this permission will be returned
Returns:
A list of all of the sites where the given WebsID is a member. If a valid OAuth token is passed with the appropriate permissions, private subscriptions will also be returned.
